oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Charles N. Barstow scrapbook
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Cover of scrapbook created by Charles N. Barstow. The front page reads, "All, Look! And Remember!" This large scrapbook contains images of the Civil War and 19th century America clipped from Leslie's and other mass-distributed 19th century papers. Only the cover has been digitized.
